                 throws ShopifyError

      • calculateRefund

        public Refund calculateRefund(Long orderId,
                              Refund_Line_Item[] refund_line_items,
                              Shipping shipping)
                       throws ShopifyError
        Description copied from interface: RefundInterface
        Calculate refund transactions based on line items and shipping. The returned response can be used to create a Refund. Note that returned transactions are of the kind "suggested refund", which must be changed to refund in order for them to be accepted.
        Specified by:
        calculateRefund in interface RefundInterface
        Parameters:
        orderId - A Long object containing the order ID
        refund_line_items - Array of line item IDs and quantities to refund
        shipping - Shipping Object specifying how much shipping to refund.
        Returns:
        Refund Object containing the suggested refund.
        Throws:
        ShopifyError - if order is not found or there is some issue

      • createRefund

        public Refund createRefund(Long orderId,
                           Refund refund)
                    throws ShopifyError
        Description copied from interface: RefundInterface
        Create a Refund for an existing Order. It is highly suggested that you use calculateRefund to produce the transactions to submit.
        Specified by:
        createRefund in interface RefundInterface
        Parameters:
        orderId - A string containing the order Id
        refund - A refund object containing information about refund to process
        Returns:
        Refund object containing the processed refund.
        Throws:
        ShopifyError - if order is not found or there is some issue
